repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: First part of a French-Telugu-Tamil dictionary. Incomplete: contains almost only the entries in French. Telugu and Tamil glosses only at the beginning. Occasional Tamil glosses added later in the rest of the dictionary.
For the second part, see BnF Indien 226.
At the beginning of the volume are inserted pages of a French-Tamil dictionary (U1, f1-f2, f4).
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (September 2021).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

extent.note: The leaves are broader in their middle than at their edges.

collation.desc: the front cover. Shelfmark on recto.
1 folio = front guard leaf. No foliation. Shelfmarks on recto. Binder note on recto. Verso blank. Element of library binding.
211 folios = Dictionary. Library Arabic foliation in red ballpen 1-211. 400 x 255 mm.
3 folios = French-Tamil Dictionary. Library Arabic foliation in red ballpen 1-2, 4. f1 folded (original size: 420 x 255 mm), f4 folded. f2v blank.

208 folios = French-Telugu dictionary. Library Arabic foliation in red ballpen 3, 5-211. Partial Arabic pagination in black ink 1-356. Paginated pages are interrupted by non paginated pages, e.g., pp. 1-2 = f3, f4, pp. 3-4 = f5, f6, pp. 5-6 = f7, etc. The unpaginated pages are mostly blank and are inserted notes. Telugu glosses only up to f25v = p. 32. From there onwards, only French entries, but here and there Tamil glosses added, e.g. f40r (black ink), f71r (black pencil).
1 folio = back guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso. Element of library binding.

additions.desc: Title DICTIONNAIRE FRANÇAIS TAMOUL TELOUGOU A-I (spine).
BnF shelfmark in black pencil: Tam 225 (spine).
BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 225 (front cover, verso).
BnF shelfmark in black pencil: Tamoul N° 2261 (f[1]r).
BnF shelfmark in black ink: Tam. 226I (f[1]r).

Binder's note in black ink (f[1]r):
Volume de 211 feuillets.
plus le feuillet 198bis.
Les feuillets 3-5 sont mutilés
21 juin 1869.
Shelfmark sticker (Société Asiatique?), written in black ink: 212 (f2v).

binding.p: Brown covers. Title and shelfmark on the spine.

origin.origDate: No internal date. Dated to circa 1780 by Vinson in Vinson et al. (1866-) and to 1780 by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably palaeographical and material analysis arguments). Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854), bequested in 1855 to the Société Asiatique, Paris (Rosny 1868).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequested by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois et malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 36.
James, Gregory. 2000. Colporuḷ: A History of Tamil Dictionaries. 1st edition. Chennai: Cre-A. — See p. 699.
Rosny, Léon de. 1868. La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In Variétés orientales, 177‒224. Paris: Maisonneuve.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 53r, no. 225 212 226.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, May 2022.

body.ab:
A
a. lettre. A. Akaram. Akāram. Aḵkāṉ.
l'ajournement. attendre au lendemain.
see U1b
absous.
s'abstenir. avec régime

ab.seg:
illégitime contre la raison,
contre la justice
injuste
Mariage illegitime
